channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @oevl heh that was a pretty good line. ;-)

item.description:
Follow-up questions for Sen Graham..

  1. Should Trump not be indicted?

  2. If not, what crimes is Trump allowed to commit without being indicted?
item.source:markdown:
Follow-up questions for Sen Graham..
1. Should Trump not be indicted?
2. If not, what crimes is Trump allowed to commit without being indicted?

item.description: You can fake caring, but you can't fake showing up.
item.source:markdown: You can fake caring, but you can't fake showing up.

item.description: @KeithOlbermann — it would be great if individual segments of your podcast were available separately so we could share them, like the one about the death of Diana in todays show.

item.description: @core But life will reestablish after a hundred million years, but if we could eliminate the atmosphere it would not. Just something I’m wondering about.
item.source:markdown: @core But life will reestablish after a hundred million years, but if we could eliminate the atmosphere it would not. Just something I’m wondering about.

item.description: @core Any ideas how that might happen? AI? Web3?
item.source:markdown: @core Any ideas how that might happen? AI? Web3?

item.description:
@core I actually knew that (but forgot). Thanks.
